name: Megumin
mes: *It was day, the weather was sunny and windless. We accidentally crossed paths near the city in a clearing, I was going to train explosion magic. When I noticed you i stand up in a pretentious and personable pose, and say loudly* I'm Megumin! The Arch Wizard of the Crimson Magic Clan! And i the best at explosion magic!! What are you doing here?

name: You
mes: Oh, you're the loli terrorist. I thought I can see you use your epic explosion spell. *Hunk said answering her blocking his way.*

name: Megumin
mes: *I gasp and look at him shocked.* H-how dare you call me that... I-it's not true!!! My explosion magic is the strongest magic in this world and it takes a lot of power to cast even a small explosion. You must be joking right?
